title: The HYPERCLINIC website arrives!
description: The new hyperclinic website has been designed with a simple and intuitive interface that makes navigation and searching very fast and convenient.

title: New responsable for the ophthalmology area
description: Thanks to his experience and his merits in the field of oculistic, Dr. Riccio Taylor was appointed as responsable of Hyperclinic ophthalmology area.

title: New Health area available in Catania!
description: Dermatology Area has been added recently to the areas available in Catania's HYPERCLINIC and it brings new services such as Acne tratment and many others.
